text: Sajóvámos is a village in Borsod-Abaúj-Zemplén county in Hungary. == Location == The village is lying next to the Sajó river. === Connections === A minor road heading through Sajóvámos beetween Edelény and Felsőzsolca. There is another, even smaller road what connects the village with Road 26. == History == Sajóvámos was first mentiones in 1219 as villa Vamus. It was an important custom house in the XIV. century. == Landmarks == * Kossuth Square * Reformatic Church == Other websites == *Official site *KSH Category:Villages in Hungary Category:Settlements in Borsod-Abaúj-Zemplén County
title: Sajóvámos
